text_id: Demi matahari dan sinarnya pada waktu duha (ketika matahari naik sepenggalah),
text_en: I CALL TO witness the sun and his early morning splendour,
And the moon as she follows in his wake,
The day when it reveals his radiance,
The night when it covers him over,
The earth and its spreading out,
The soul and how it was integrated

text_id: lalu Dia mengilhamkan kepadanya (jalan) kejahatan dan ketakwaannya,
text_en: And given the faculty of knowing what is disruptive and what is intrinsic to it.

text_id: sungguh beruntung orang yang menyucikannya (jiwa itu)
text_en: He who nourishes it will surely be successful,

text_id: dan sungguh rugi orang yang mengotorinya.
text_en: And he who confines it will surely come to grief.

text_id: (Kaum) Samud telah mendustakan (rasulnya) karena mereka melampaui batas
text_en: The Thamud denied (the truth) in their perverseness

text_id: ketika orang yang paling celaka di antara mereka bangkit (untuk menyembelih unta betina Allah).
text_en: When among them the great wretch arose,

text_id: Rasul Allah (Saleh) lalu berkata kepada mereka, “(Biarkanlah) unta betina Allah ini beserta minumannya.”
text_en: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God's she-camel, let her drink."
transliteration: fa qāla lahum rasụlullāhi nāqatallāhi wa suqyāhā

text_id: Namun, mereka kemudian mendustakannya (Saleh) dan menyembelih (unta betina) itu. Maka, Tuhan membinasakan mereka karena dosa-dosanya, lalu meratakan mereka (dengan tanah).
text_en: But they called him a liar and hamstrung her. So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.
transliteration: fa każżabụhu fa 'aqarụhā fa damdama 'alaihim rabbuhum biżambihim fa sawwāhā

text_en: He does not fear the consequence.
